listDisplay.primary: Prometheus - The Fire-Bringer, Champion of Humanity
listDisplay.expandedContent: The rebellious Titan whose name means "Forethought," Prometheus defied the will of Zeus to bring the gift of fire to humanity. His story embodies the eternal struggle between divine authority and the advancement of civilization, between tyranny and the liberation of knowledge.

sections.content: The rebellious Titan whose name means "Forethought," Prometheus defied the will of Zeus to bring the gift of fire to humanity. His story embodies the eternal struggle between divine authority and the advancement of civilization, between tyranny and the liberation of knowledge.
